description:
During the French Revolution the queen, Marie Antoinette, created fully functioning artificial villages. There is an odd similarity between smart cities and the “hameau”. They were developed on the estate of the elite to control the people, and keep a close eye on an resistance that could have been brewing.
This video is just me sharing my thoughts on this idea. For more in depth comparison and knowledge, check out this video :
https://youtu.be/KJKI1zhP41A
By Amazing Polly on YouTube 👍🏽
